title: Hollyoaks' Nadine Mulkerrin jokes newborn son looks like Kylie Jenner as she begs Jennifer Metcalfe for advice

Nadine Mulkerrin has joked her newborn son looks just like Kylie Jenner thanks to his lips.

The Hollyoaks actress, who gave birth to her little boy Reggie with co-star and fiance Rory Douglas-Speed earlier this week, was up all night feeding her son and messaging Jennifer Metcalfe for parenting advice.

Nadine, 26, shared screenshots of her conversation with her co-star and friend after she text to say: "Sending all my love."

A sleep-deprived Nadine, who appears to still be in hospital, then messaged back to joke about the difference a single day made.

"Day 1 - smug motherf**ker this is world most chilled well behaved silent sleepy content baby," she wrote to Jen.

(Image: Instagram)

"Day 2 Will this ever end. Why won't you go back in your f**king bed I've tried tricking him like 18 times just wants to lie on my nipple in his throat sleeping.

"Cheers bud," she added sarcastically.

Nadine shared the conversation to her Instagram Story, adding: "This is hard but f***ing awesome.

"@Missjenjomet now if you could just wake up that be great."

Jennifer, who plays Mercedes McQueen in Hollyoaks, gave birth to her and ex-Geordie Shore star Greg Lake's son Daye in August 2017 and returned to the soap after her maternity leave.

Nadine also shared a snap of herself in the early hours of the morning sitting bolt upright in her hospital bed, having got no sleep.

(Image: Instagram)

"Knowing the tea trolley is coming soon and it's morning and I'm not longer in Game Of Thrones ep 'The Long Night'," she joked.

The soap star then posted a close-up of her little boy, captioning it: "But this face and Kylie Jenner lips."

Just yesterday, she and Rory announced the news of their new arrival's birth on Instagram.

(Image: Instagram)

Proud first-time dad Rory broke the news, sharing the first picture of his new arrival being cradled in Nadine's arms.

"Welcome to the family wee Reggie Speed 15.8.19," he wrote.

"We love You man. So proud of Nadine, I didn't think I could love her anymore but my heart is bloody bursting! She was amazing throughout her labour. Women are seriously Superhuman x."

(Image: Instagram)

The happy couple, who met on the set of the Channel 4 soap, got engaged last December after dating for a year.

And she revealed she was expecting when she showed off her bump on the red carpet of the British Soap Awards this year.

Their characters - Joel Dexter and Cleo McQueen - got married themselves on Hollyoaks, and Rory followed suit months later with his own proposal.

(Image: David Fisher/ITV/REX)

"It was terrifying. I felt like I was on my knee for an eternity and I remember saying: ‘Go on, just say something!'" he joked to OK! magazine.

"I felt that she was always going to say yes because we always have a laugh about it, but in that moment when I was on my knee I thought, she’s saying no!"
description: Nadine Mulkerrin, who gave birth to her first child this week, shared her WhatsApp conversation with Jennifer Metcalfe after staying up all night breastfeeding
